website_summaries.verdict: This active, talkative Baby Alive doll offers plenty of play options and the opportunity to learn nurturing skills.
pros: Doll speaks a few phrases in English or Spanish
Responds to included baby rattle, and crawls and moves
Extra accessories and outfit add plenty of play options
cons: Drink and “wet” only, no food option
Included diaper doesn’t quite hold the “wet.” Doll can use up quite a few batteries in a very short time

customer_reviews.title: Baby Alive doll was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my daughter's most wanted Christmas gifts of 2018. She doesn't play with this Baby Alive doll as much as I thought she would, but I think that is more about my individual child than the doll itself. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: luvbizkit

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: This doll is fantastic. My granddaughter loves it. It really crawls. She loves to dress it, undress it, change her diaper, feed her, over and over again. Keeps her busy for hours! Great buy with the added accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters 6th birthday. Gave it to her 2 Feb. stopped working 10 March. Changed batteries...still doesn’t work. Very disappointing for me and my 6 year old. 🤨 return window closed on the 27 of Feb so now apparently we are out of luck too. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: This Doll is just perfect
customer_reviews.text: The Baby Alive Go Bye Bye set is a great purchase. Our daughter loves all the Baby Alive products. This one will not disappoint. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MomofFive

customer_reviews.title: My daughters were in love with baby Alive and begged for them for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My daughters were in love with baby Alive and begged for them for Christmas. We purchased two Baby go bye bye and Snackin Sara. Both of them stopped working within a week of purchase. These are pretty pricey for such a short term use.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Adorable baby has found a loving home.
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo daughter, who has never really played with baby dolls before, had this on the top of her list for Christmas. She has had so much fun with it. She was excited to get the bonus set with the tiger outfit. Arrived in perfect condition. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun doll!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll! It quickly became one of her favorites.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy Here
customer_reviews.text: Did not work even when we replaced the batteries.. P.O.S. can't return even though it was a birthday gift. Tried to contact the seller but no response back and it's been weeks now!
customer_reviews.author: T. RAY

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made my niece very happy!!!! And in time for Christmas!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Huntley

customer_reviews.title: Does not Poop!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described but know this doll drinks and pees only (you can not feed it the food packets / it does not poop)
customer_reviews.author: C. Lizotte

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! Did not even last for 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Baby alive go bye bye has already stopped crawling and talking. Very disappointed! Did not even last for 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: g.g.  flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Packing damaged on corners like it was opened and sealed again.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one day of limited use. For ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one day of limited use. For the money that is absurd. Refund started and will be ordering another one. Hopefully the one she got was just defective but reading other reviews I am not hopeful of that.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter Loved The Doll And All The Accessories that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received good in due time, was working good an then it just stopped working a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the girls were thrilled with the newest addition to the baby alive collection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this doll was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it. It really does crawl. I was worried because usually toys never live up to the advertising and can be disappointing, but this doll was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Thresa Allen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking doll. I need to Return it. Granddaughter Got 2.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Smith

customer_reviews.title: Almost like a real baby.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for granddaughter at Christmas. She is 8 and loves it. The price to buy more diapers is way too high. My daughter-in-law picked up some preemie diapers for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Logan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old granddaughter loves her new baby doll!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: This baby alive doll doesn’t truly crawl. One of her legs won’t stay bent so she can’t crawl. Additionally we tried to comb her hair and a great deal came out! My little girl was not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jlua

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and on-time. My daughter loves it, bordering on obsession... Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open but looks great it's a gift I will take to Brasil
customer_reviews.author: ibella2013

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece was so happy to get this for her birthday present. Definitely her favorite gift by far.
customer_reviews.author: James King

customer_reviews.title: great doll! cheaper in store if your lucky enough to find one
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doll. My daughter has been asking for it for the past two months. She's going to be so excited when she unwraps Santa's gift. If you are able to find this at Wal-Mart in store it's much cheaper. But they fly off the shelf super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shotty
customer_reviews.text: Worst item ever ,worked for a week then stopped want another to replace the one that is defective .its so upsetting for my daughter .Disgraceful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandbaby loves loves it
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my two year old grandbaby....she loves it....great product...
customer_reviews.author: karens

customer_reviews.title: LOL
customer_reviews.text: My daughter phone and it was not the same as a result of a good one time for a few years back and use the term of office of a sudden it was the best of the day before I get a follow back on LOL

product_meta.title: Baby Alive Baby Go Bye Bye Blonde Bonus Set
product_meta.description: There's many ways to play with the Baby Go Bye Bye doll! Better keep an eye on her... because she crawls and talks wow, watch her go! Tickle her tummy and she crawls. Shake her adorable rattle and she crawls over when she hears it.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
